titles.title: Recognizing September 2012 as the 160th anniversary of the arrival in the United States of Constantino Brumidi, the artist who painted the Apotheosis of Washington.
Recognizing September 2012 as the 160th anniversary of the arrival in the United States of Constantino Brumidi, the artist who painted the Apotheosis of Washington.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Recognizes the 160th anniversary of the arrival in the United States of Constantino Brumidi, who painted the Apotheosis of Washington.
